# Basic SET/GET Operations First user SET, total users: bob Second user SET, total users: alice
# Testing Expiration TTL for temp_user: 3 seconds TTL after expiration: -2 Expired user value: null
# Use Case 1: Tracking Logged-in Users with Set 1. Initial state: no user is logged in: [] 2. User "alice" logs in: [alice] 3. User "bob" logs in: [bob, alice] 4. User "alice" logs off: [bob] 5. User "eve" logs in: [bob, eve]
